page.title: 09THE VILLAGE OF HARTLEY
page.content: {Hartley }is one of the prettiest villages in the {Eden Valley.}It is dominated by a hill on which once stood the medieval {Harcla Castle.} It has 36 houses and about 100 inhabitants. Many professional people retire here.{Hartley Beck}flows beside its one street. On weekdays wagons go through{Hartley}to the limestone quarry nearby, but on Sundays the village is very quiet. There are no shops in the village nor any meeting place. An occasional dance or rally has been held in a barn at{Hartley {Fold Farm.}This year the seven a side football team won the Waitby Cup. Many walkers go through {Hartley }on their way to{Nine Standards,}nine huge cairns built on the skyline. The Coast to Coast walk also passes through the village.
